title: What are the best subjects to study online? - Quora
tags: How Do I Learn X as an Adult?

response.answer_text: Any course that has a "learn by doing" or repetitive iteration model is ideal for learning online. For example, programming lessons on sites like Code Academy offer simple, testable ways of practicing and checking if your code is right. This type of educational product is faster and more efficient than human assistance.  For subjects that are deeply rooted in discussion,like Literature, History, and Business, the learning process in more about discussion than it is iteration. Therefore, courses like these also need an active community and discussion to reach comparable quality to a live experience.  Therefore, I think the first types are more bang for your buck, if you will.

If you want to study online, languages are the easiest subjects to learn. With internet available in most of the world you can have an opportunity to learn languages from native speakers connecting from their country. On sites like ClassDo you can get in touch with teachers from 90 countries and have online lessons. There are plenty of qualified teachers of languages as well as many other subjects.Most teachers have Free Trial Lessons so you can speak to them before you decide on taking lessons. Here is the link to ClassDo, try doing a search for a subject that interests you: Learn. Teach. Anytime, Anywhere
